title: JAYALALITHA GOES BERSERK OVER SRI LANKAN KIDS PLAYING SOCCER IN CHENNAI AND SENDS THEM HOME
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana The racist Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu Jayalalitha went into frenzy when she learned that Sri Lankan school kids are scheduled to play friendly soccer games with Tamil Nadu school kids and in a rage has ordered suspension of the stadium officer of the Jawaharlal Nehru Indoor stadium in Chennai…
